words.translation: Indeed, We|[We] sent|Nuh|to|his people|that|Warn|your people|from|before|[that]|comes to them|a punishment|painful

translations.1: Innaaa arsalnaa Noohan ilaa qawmihee an anzir qawmaka min qabli any yaatiyahum 'azaabun aleem
translations.2: Inna arsalna noohan ila qawmihi an anthir qawmaka min qabli an yatiyahum AAathabun aleemun

words.translation: He said|O my people!|Indeed I am|to you|a warner|clear

translations.1: Qaala yaa-qawmi innee lakum nazeerum mubeen
translations.2: Qala ya qawmi innee lakum natheerun mubeenun

words.translation: That|Worship|Allah|and fear Him|and obey me

translations.1: Ani' budul laaha watta-qoohu Wa-atee'oon
translations.2: Ani oAAbudoo Allaha waittaqoohu waateeAAooni

words.translation: He will forgive|for you|[of]|your sins|and give you respite|for|a term|specified|Indeed|(the) term|(of) Allah|when|it comes|not|is delayed|if|you|know

translations.1: Yaghfir lakum min zunoobikum Wa-yu'akhkhirkum ilaaa ajalim musammaa; innaa ajalal laahi izaa jaaa'a laa yu'akhkhar; law kuntum ta'lamoon
translations.2: Yaghfir lakum min thunoobikum wayuakhkhirkum ila ajalin musamman inna ajala Allahi itha jaa la yuakhkharu law kuntum taAAlamoona

words.translation: He said|My Lord!|Indeed I|invited|my people|night|and day

translations.1: Qaala rabbi innee da'awtu qawmee lailanw Wa-naharaa
translations.2: Qala rabbi innee daAAawtu qawmee laylan wanaharan

words.translation: But not|increased them|my invitation|except|(in) flight

translations.1: Falam yazid-hum du'aaa-'eee illaa firaaraa
translations.2: Falam yazidhum duAAaee illa firaran

words.translation: And indeed I|every time|I invited them|that You may forgive|them|they put|their fingers|in|their ears|and covered themselves|(with) their garments|and persisted|and were arrogant|(with) pride

translations.1: Wa-inee kullamaa da'awtuhum litaghfira lahum ja'alooo asaabi'ahum fee aazaanihim wastaghshaw siyaabahum Wa-asarroo wastakbarus tikbaaraa
translations.2: Wainnee kullama daAAawtuhum litaghfira lahum jaAAaloo asabiAAahum fee athanihim waistaghshaw thiyabahum waasarroo waistakbaroo istikbaran

words.translation: Then|indeed I|invited them|publicly

translations.1: Summa innee da'aw-tuhum jihaara
translations.2: Thumma innee daAAawtuhum jiharan

words.translation: Then|indeed I|announced|to them|and I confided|to them|secretly

translations.1: Summaa inneee a'lantu lahum Wa-asrartu lahum israaraa
translations.2: Thumma innee aAAlantu lahum waasrartu lahum israran

words.translation: Then I said|Ask forgiveness|(from) your Lord|Indeed He|is|Oft-Forgiving

translations.1: Faqultus taghfiroo Rabakum innahoo kaana Ghaffaaraa
translations.2: Faqultu istaghfiroo rabbakum innahu kana ghaffaran

words.translation: He will send down|(rain from) the sky|upon you|(in) abundance

translations.1: Yursilis samaaa'a 'alaikum midraaraa
translations.2: Yursili alssamaa AAalaykum midraran

words.translation: And provide you|with wealth|and children|and make|for you|gardens|and make|for you|rivers

translations.1: Wa-yumdidkum bi-am-waalinw Wa-baneena Wa-yaj'al lakum Jannaatinw Wa-yaj'al lakum anhaaraa
translations.2: Wayumdidkum biamwalin wabaneena wayajAAal lakum jannatin wayajAAal lakum anharan

words.translation: What|(is) for you|not|you attribute|to Allah|grandeur

translations.1: Maa lakum laa tarjoona lillaahi waqaaraa
translations.2: Ma lakum la tarjoona lillahi waqaran

words.translation: And indeed|He created you|(in) stages

translations.1: Wa-qad khalaqakum at-waaraa
translations.2: Waqad khalaqakum atwaran

words.translation: Do not|you see|how|did create|Allah|(the) seven|heavens|(in) layers

translations.1: Alam taraw kaifa khalaqal laahu sab'a samaawaatin tibaaqaa
translations.2: Alam taraw kayfa khalaqa Allahu sabAAa samawatin tibaqan

words.translation: And made|the moon|therein|a light|and made|the sun|a lamp

translations.1: Wa-ja'alal qamara feehinna nooranw Wa-ja'alash shamsa siraajaa
translations.2: WajaAAala alqamara feehinna nooran wajaAAala alshshamsa sirajan

words.translation: And Allah|has caused you to grow|from|the earth|(as) a growth

translations.1: Wallaahu ambatakum minal ardi nabaataa
translations.2: WaAllahu anbatakum mina alardi nabatan

words.translation: Then|He will return you|into it|and bring you forth|(a new) bringing forth

translations.1: Summa yu'eedukum feehaa Wa-ukhrijukum ikhraajaa
translations.2: Thumma yuAAeedukum feeha wayukhrijukum ikhrajan

words.translation: And Allah|made|for you|the earth|an expanse

translations.1: Wallaahu ja'ala lakumul arda bisaataa
translations.2: WaAllahu jaAAala lakumu alarda bisatan

words.translation: That you may go along|therein|(in) paths|wide

translations.1: Litaslukoo minhaa subulan fijaajaa
translations.2: Litaslukoo minha subulan fijajan

words.translation: Said|Nuh|My Lord!|Indeed they|disobeyed me|and followed|(the one) who|(did) not|increase him|his wealth|and his children|except|(in) loss

translations.1: Qaala Noohur Rabbi innahum 'asawnee wattaba'oo mal lam yazid-hu maaluhoo Wa-waladuhooo illaa khasaara
translations.2: Qala noohun rabbi innahum AAasawnee waittabaAAoo man lam yazidhu maluhu wawaladuhu illa khasaran

words.translation: And they have planned|a plan|great

translations.1: Wa-makaroo makran kubbaaraa
translations.2: Wamakaroo makran kubbaran

words.translation: And they said|(Do) not|leave|your gods|and (do) not|leave|Wadd|and not|Suwa|and not|Yaguth|and Yauq|and Nasr

translations.1: Wa-qaaloo laa tazarunna aalihatakum Wa-laa tazarunna Waddanw Wa-laa Suwaa'anw Wa-laa Yaghoosa Wa-Ya'ooqa Wa-Nasraa
translations.2: Waqaloo la tatharunna alihatakum wala tatharunna waddan wala suwaAAan wala yaghootha wayaAAooqa wanasran

words.translation: And indeed|they have led astray|many|And not|increase|the wrongdoers|except|(in) error

translations.1: Wa-qad adalloo kasee-ranw Wa-laa tazidiz zaalimeena illaa dalaalaa
translations.2: Waqad adalloo katheeran wala tazidi alththalimeena illa dalalan

words.translation: Because of|their sins|they were drowned|then made to enter|(the) Fire|and not|they found|for themselves|from|besides|Allah|any helpers

translations.1: Mimmaa khateee'-aatihim ughriqoo fa-udkhiloo Naaran falam yajidoo lahum min doonil laahi ansaaraa
translations.2: Mimma khateeatihim oghriqoo faodkhiloo naran falam yajidoo lahum min dooni Allahi ansaran

words.translation: And said|Nuh|My Lord!|(Do) not|leave|on|the earth|any|(of) the disbelievers|(as) an inhabitant

translations.1: Wa-qaala Noohur Rabbi laa tazar 'alal ardi minal kaafireena daiyaaraa
translations.2: Waqala noohun rabbi la tathar AAala alardi mina alkafireena dayyaran

words.translation: Indeed You|if|You leave them|they will mislead|Your slaves|and not|they will beget|except|a wicked|a disbeliever

translations.1: Innaka in tazarhum yudil-loo 'ibaadaka Wa-laa yalidooo illaa faajiran kaffaaraa
translations.2: Innaka in tatharhum yudilloo AAibadaka wala yalidoo illa fajiran kaffaran

words.translation: My Lord!|Forgive|me|and my parents|and whoever|enters|my house|a believer|and believing men|and believing women|And (do) not|increase|the wrongdoers|except|(in) destruction

translations.1: Rabbigh fir lee Wa-liwaa-lidaiya Wa-liman dakhala baitiya mu'minanw Wa-lil-mu'mineena wal-mu'minaati Wa-laa tazidiz zaalimeena illaa tabaaraa
translations.2: Rabbi ighfir lee waliwalidayya waliman dakhala baytiya muminan walilmumineena waalmuminati wala tazidi alththalimeena illa tabaran
